About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Thurs 10-8pm, Fri 10-5pm and Sat 10-4pm; closed Sun and public holidays. General reference assistance available. Introductory brochure available.

About.Access: It is preferred that patrons be library members with the exception of visitors to the district.

About.Acquisition focus: Published and unpublished information for the Noarlunga City area from pre-white settlement to recent times.
